title: Wayne Rooney parties in Washington DC amid Coleen’s drama with Rebekah Vardy
text:
Wayne was living his best life this weekend (Picture: @samimeslami)

Wayne Rooney hit the town on Saturday for a night of partying in Washington DC, miles away from home in the UK where his wife, Coleen Rooney, is embroiled in a scandal with fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy.

The 33-year-old DC United footballer was spotted by a fan enjoying his evening at Living Room DC on Saturday evening.

Perhaps in an attempt to keep a low-key profile, Wayne was seen wearing a cap and sitting on his own as club-goers around him danced to Joe Budden’s Pump It Up.

At one point, a waitress wearing high-waisted thongs was seen approaching Wayne with drinks before quickly walking off.

Wayne seemed to be in good spirits and was happy to pose for a photo with fans, including one who filmed the footballer and cheekily made a joke about his wife’s feud with Rebekah, writing in their Instagram story: ‘When someone tells @waynerooney that @beckyvardy is in the house.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The striker has chosen to publicly remain silent on the epic scandal after Coleen, 33, alleged false stories about her had been leaked to the press from Rebekah’s Instagram account.

In a shocking message last week, Coleen explained how she set up a sting after growing suspicious that someone who was able to view her private posts was selling stories to newspapers.

Wayne kept a low-key profile (Picture: @samimeslami)

But he was more than happy to pose with fans (Picture: @samimeslami)

The footballer is yet to comment on his wife’s drama (Picture: @samimeslami)

At the end of the post, the mother-of-four claimed Rebekah’s Instagram account was the only one which had access to her Instagram stories.

Rebekah, 37, has vehemently denied selling stories about Coleen and has hired a team to conduct a thorough investigation.

Still, it’s sparked an almighty feud between the two while other WAGS and celebrities such as Danielle Lloyd and Stacey Solomon have taken sides.

Even Wayne’s former escort Helen Wood has weighed in on the controversy and chose to side with Coleen, calling Rebekah a ‘snake in the grass’.

Wayne isn’t the only one letting his hair down as Coleen, with whom he shares four sons, was spotted enjoying a night out in Manchester on Thursday to celebrate footballer Wes Brown’s 40th birthday.
